title: JSON snapshot cache warm start
description: Persist daemon index snapshots to cache JSON, support warm reload, and reconcile on-disk deltas on startup.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Starting warm-start cache snapshot work: persist daemon index, load cached snapshot on startup, and rebuild when invalid.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented warm-start cache loading on daemon startup for Python and Rust; uses cache validation with rebuild fallback. Tests: make check-python, make check-rust.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Completed warm-start cache snapshot path with fallback rebuild. Tests: make check-python, make check-rust.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Commit: bdea068. Tests: make check-python, make check-rust.

custom.beads_acceptance_criteria: Warm start path is implemented with correctness checks and fallback rebuild on invalid snapshots.
